name: Jumps Per Minute
description:
The rhythm is so sick, you just can't help but jump to the beat.

Jumping is out of your control, and in the hands of the beat of the music. Jumps Per Minute is a platformer in which you need to move with the music, in order to time your jumps properly.

Originally developed for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam

Music Credit: Timecrawler 82 – Driving in the Rain:
